overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Created AR effects for Instagram using Spark AR Studio. Currently unavailable due to service termination.

omikuji.title: Omikuji Effect
omikuji.description: Starts with a screen tap, and displays the omikuji after blinking when the animation begins. I also drew the illustrations myself.

reactions.title: Reactions
reactions.description: Featured by web writers and received positive feedback via DMs from multiple users.
